				function appendFacebookSDK() {
					window.fbAsyncInit = function () {
						FB.init({
							appId: '156247124404264',
							version: 'v2.7',
							channelUrl: '/channel.html',
							status: true,
							cookie: true,
							xfbml: true,
							oauth: true
						});
					};

					// Load the SDK Asynchronously
					(function (d) {
						var js, id = 'facebook-jssdk', ref = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
						if (d.getElementById(id)) {
							return;
						}
						js = d.createElement('script');
						js.id = id;
						js.async = true;
						js.onload = function () {
							if (typeof runFacebookLogin == 'function') {
								runFacebookLogin();
							}
							if (typeof runFacebookRegistrationLogin == 'function') {
								runFacebookRegistrationLogin();
							}
						};

												js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_GB/all.js";
						ref.parentNode.insertBefore(js, ref);
					}(document));
				}

											<div class="collapsible advertContainer" data-dfp-id="EGNET_LB_1" data-dfp-sizes="728x90, 960x160, 960x250, 970x250, 1260x110, 1260x160, 1260x200, 1260x250" data-dfp-targeting="site=eurogamer.net,position=atf" id="div-ga-EGNET_LB_1"></div>										</div>

					<div class="document">
						<div class="main ">
							
			
			<article class="article">

				
		    
			<header class="article-header ">

				
				
				
				<h1 class="title">Pokémon Go Type chart, Type effectiveness and weakness&nbsp;explained	</h1>

									<p class="strapline">
												Calculate the damage for any matchup with our Type&nbsp;Chart.					</p>
				
				<div class="metadata">
					<div class="author-name">
												<strong class="feature-type">Guide</strong>
																			by																							Chris Tapsell, Staff Writer																		</div>

											<div class="social">
														<a href="//www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2018-12-21-pokemon-go-type-chart-effectiveness-weaknesses" data-type="facebook" class="button circle colour-facebook" rel="nofollow"><i class="fa fa-facebook"></i></a>
							<a href="//twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Pok%E9mon+Go+Type+chart%2C+Type+effectiveness+and+weakness+explained+https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2018-12-21-pokemon-go-type-chart-effectiveness-weaknesses" data-type="twitter" class="button circle colour-twitter" rel="nofollow"><i class="fa fa-twitter"></i></a>
							<a href="//www.reddit.com/submit?url=https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2018-12-21-pokemon-go-type-chart-effectiveness-weaknesses&amp;title=Pok%E9mon+Go+Type+chart%2C+Type+effectiveness+and+weakness+explained" data-type="reddit" class="button circle colour-reddit" rel="nofollow"><i class="fa fa-reddit-alien"></i></a>
						</div>
					
					<div class="date">
													Updated on 							<span itemprop="dateModified" content="2019-08-01T14:01:24+01:00">1 August 2019</span>
											</div>

				</div>


							</header>

		
				<div class="body">

					
					
					
											<div class="desktop-mpu">
							<div class="collapsible advertContainer" data-dfp-id="EGNET_MPU_1" data-dfp-sizes="300x250" data-dfp-targeting="site=eurogamer.net,position=atf" id="div-ga-EGNET_MPU_1" data-dfp-collapse="true"></div>						</div>
					
					
					
<section class=""><p><strong>Type Chart</strong> methods of representing <strong>Type effectiveness</strong> have been popular since long before Pokémon Go, with all of the core Pokémon games revolving around them.</p>
  <eg-promoted-link char-count="10"></eg-promoted-link><p>In brief, Pokémon types dictate whether one Pokémon is either strong or weak - super effective or not very effective - against another, dealing additional or reduced damage as a result - and receiving additional or reduced damamage - as a result.</p>
  <eg-promoted-link char-count="246"></eg-promoted-link><p>The standard Type chart that has evolved through the different generations will be like a second language to long-term Pokémon fans, but to newcomers it can appear too daunting to even know where to begin, so with that in mind we've put together a type chart of our own, as well as an explanation of how Type effectivness works and how to plan around it, just below.</p>
  <eg-promoted-link char-count="366"></eg-promoted-link></section><section class=""><h2>Type chart, effectiveness and weakness explained in Pokémon Go</h2><p>Pokémon Go's Types are exactly the same as those in the main Pokémon games, but the effect of those type matchups is slightly different: in brief, things like effective or resisted attacks have slightly different multipliers to the main Pokémon games - although a December 2018 update brought them slightly closer in line.</p><eg-promoted-link char-count="322"></eg-promoted-link><p>Here's a Pokémon Go type chart to get you started on what's effective against what.</p><eg-promoted-link char-count="83"></eg-promoted-link><div class="table-wrapper"><table class=" "><thead><tr><th>Type</th><th>Strong Against</th><th>Weak Against</th><th>Resistant To</th><th>Vulnerable To</th>
</tr></thead><tbody><tr class="row1 "><td><strong>Normal</strong></td><td></td><td>Rock, Ghost, Steel</td><td>Ghost</td><td>Fighting</td></tr><tr class="row0 "><td><strong>Fighting</strong></td><td>Normal, Rock, Steel, Ice, Dark</td><td>Flying, Poison, Psychic, Bug, Ghost, Fairy</td><td>Rock, Bug, Dark</td><td>Flying, Psychic, Fairy</td></tr><tr class="row1 "><td><strong>Flying</strong></td><td>Fighting, Bug, Grass</td><td>Rock, Steel, Electric</td><td>Fighting, Ground, Bug, Grass</td><td>Rock, Electric, Ice</td></tr><tr class="row0 "><td><strong>Poison</strong></td><td>Grass, Fairy</td><td>Poison, Ground, Rock, Ghost, Steel</td><td>Fighting, Poison, Grass, Fairy</td><td>Ground, Psychic</td></tr><tr class="row1 "><td><strong>Ground</strong></td><td>Poison, Rock, Steel, Fire, Electric</td><td>Flying, Bug, Grass</td><td>Poison, Rock, Electric</td><td>Water, Grass, Ice</td></tr><tr class="row0 "><td><strong>Rock</strong></td><td>Flying, Bug, Fire, Ice</td><td>Fighting, Ground, Steel</td><td>Normal, Flying, Poison, Fire</td><td>Fighting, Ground, Steel, Water, Grass</td></tr><tr class="row1 "><td><strong>Bug</strong></td><td>Grass, Psychic, Dark</td><td>Fighting, Flying, Poison, Ghost, Steel, Fire, Fairy</td><td>Fighting, Ground, Grass</td><td>Flying, Rock, Fire</td></tr><tr class="row0 "><td><strong>Ghost</strong></td><td>Ghost, Psychic</td><td>Normal, Dark</td><td>Normal, Fighting, Poison, Bug</td><td>Ghost, Dark</td></tr><tr class="row1 "><td><strong>Steel</strong></td><td>Rock, Ice, Fairy</td><td>Steel, Fire, Water, Electric</td><td>Normal, Flying, Poison, Rock, Bug, Steel, Grass, Psychic, Ice, Dragon, Fairy</td><td>Fighting, Ground, Fire</td></tr><tr class="row0 "><td><strong>Fire</strong></td><td>Bug, Steel, Grass, Ice</td><td>Rock, Fire, Water, Dragon</td><td>Bug, Steel, Fire, Grass, Ice</td><td>Ground, Rock, Water</td></tr><tr class="row1 "><td><strong>Water</strong></td><td>Ground, Rock, Fire</td><td>Water, Grass, Dragon</td><td>Steel, Fire, Water, Ice</td><td>Grass, Electric</td></tr><tr class="row0 "><td><strong>Grass</strong></td><td>Ground, Rock, Water</td><td>Flying, Poison, Bug, Steel, Fire, Grass, Dragon</td><td>Ground, Water, Grass, Electric</td><td>Flying, Poison, Bug, Fire, Ice</td></tr><tr class="row1 "><td><strong>Electric</strong></td><td>Flying, Water</td><td>Ground, Grass, Electric, Dragon</td><td>Flying, Steel, Electric</td><td>Ground</td></tr><tr class="row0 "><td><strong>Psychic</strong></td><td>Fighting, Poison</td><td>Steel, Psychic, Dark</td><td>Fighting, Psychic</td><td>Bug, Ghost, Dark</td></tr><tr class="row1 "><td><strong>Ice</strong></td><td>Flying, Ground, Grass, Dragon</td><td>Steel, Fire, Water, Ice</td><td>Ice</td><td>Fighting, Rock, Steel, Fire</td></tr><tr class="row0 "><td><strong>Dragon</strong></td><td>Dragon</td><td>Steel, Fairy</td><td>Fire, Water, Grass, Electric</td><td>Ice, Dragon, Fairy</td></tr><tr class="row1 "><td><strong>Fairy</strong></td><td>Fighting, Dragon, Dark</td><td>Poison, Steel, Fire</td><td>Fighting, Bug, Dragon, Dark</td><td>Poison, Steel</td></tr><tr class="row0 "><td><strong>Dark</strong></td><td>Ghost, Psychic</td><td>Fighting, Dark, Fairy</td><td>Ghost, Psychic, Dark</td><td>Fighting, Bug, Fairy</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<!-- f#11:start -->
<hr><p><i>

Pokémon Go in 2020 continues to add new features, such the arrival of the <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2020-01-28-pokemon-go-battle-league-rewards-ranks-seasons-7002">Go Battle League</a> - which is currently highlighting the <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/pokemon-go-master-league-recommendations-7002">Master League</a> - and soon, <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2020-02-11-pokemon-go-clone-pokemon-list-7002">Clone Pokémon</a>.

We've also recently had the <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2019-12-19-pokemon-go-buddy-adventure-play-excited-6002">Buddy Adventure</a> feature, which introduces a variety of perks - including finding <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2020-01-09-pokemon-go-souvenirs-7002">Souvenirs</a> - as well as a new <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2018-09-06-pokemon-go-trading-requirements-special-trades-how-to-trade-5392">trade evolution</a> feature.

2019 saw the release of the first <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2019-07-15-pokemon-go-gen-5-pokemon-list-black-white-6002">Gen 5 Pokémon</a>, along with new <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2019-06-03-pokemon-go-region-exclusive-pokemon-locations-list">regional exclusive Pokémon</a>, <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2019-04-29-pokemon-go-eggs-chart-hatching-2km-5km-7km-10km-eggs">Egg charts</a>, and the introduction of the <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2019-09-11-pokemon-go-unova-stone-6002">Unova Stone</a>.

Pokemon Go also sees regular events - including weekly <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/pokemon-go-spotlight-hour-featured-pokemon-bonus-7002">Spotlight Hour</a> evenings, monthly <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2019-06-05-pokemon-go-field-research-tasks-special-research-breakthroughs-6002">Field Research rewards</a> and <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2019-11-21-pokemon-go-community-day-time-list-moves-6002">Pokémon Go Community Day</a>,  plus a new <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2019-11-08-pokemon-go-giovanni-rewards-legendary-shadow-pokemon-6002">Giovanni counters</a> quest - the latest being <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2020-03-02-pokemon-go-the-shadowy-threat-grows-quest-tasks-rewards-7002">The Shadowy Threat Grows</a>. There is also the gradual arrival of new <a type="int" href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/pokemon-go-promo-codes-list-how-to-redeem-ios-android-4819">Promo Codes to redeem</a>, too.

</i></p>

<hr><!-- f#11:end --></section><section class=""><h2>Pokémon Go type effectiveness changes compared to other Pokémon games</h2>
  <p>As you may have noticed, there are also no Type immunities in Pokémon Go, unlike in the main series. But that's not the end of it. The immunities removed are:</p>
  <eg-promoted-link char-count="158"></eg-promoted-link><ul><li>Ground immune to Electric</li>
    <li>Flying immune to Ground</li>
    <li>Ghost immune to Normal and Fighting </li>
    <li>Normal and Fighting immune to Ghost</li>
    <li>Steel immune to Poison</li>
    <li>Dark immune to Psychic</li>
    <li>Fairy immune to Dragon</li>
  </ul><p>Instead of a total immunity to damage, these initially worked the same as simple resitances. Now, however, they've been tweaked to form another tier of resistance, with the defending Pokémon that would normally be immune taking just 0.39 times the amount of damage it normally would - in other words, type immunity roughly cuts the amount of damage received to about a third.</p>
  <eg-promoted-link char-count="375"></eg-promoted-link><p>Here's a full rundown of the multipliers that apply to standard, super effective, not very effective, immune, and doubly effective attacks.</p>
  <eg-promoted-link char-count="139"></eg-promoted-link><ul><li><strong>Not very effective</strong> - 0.625x damage, instead of the 0.5x damage done in the main series.</li>
    <li><strong>Super effecive</strong> - 1.6x damage, instead of 2x damage done in the main series.</li>
    <li><strong>Immunity</strong> - 0.39x damage, instead of 0 damage done in the main series.</li>
    <li><strong>Doubly effective</strong> - 2.56x damage, instead of 4x damage done in the main series.</li>
  </ul><p>In other words, the latest tweaks to Type effectivness brings them noticably closer to the multipliers in the mainline games - but still not in line with them entirely. It does make Type effectiveness all the more important though, so it's well worth getting to grips with those matchups if you can!</p>
  <eg-promoted-link char-count="299"></eg-promoted-link><p>Ultimately, it's your mastery of three elements that will give you the greatest shot in PvP and the Gym and Raiding scene: Type effectiveness, understanding <a href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2018-12-21-pokemon-go-moves-movesets-move-list-and-highest-dps-attacks">Pokémon Go's moves</a>, and having a good idea of the <a href="https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2019-08-01-pokemon-go-best-pokemon-5392">best Pokémon in Pokémon Go</a>.</p>
  <eg-promoted-link char-count="157"></eg-promoted-link></section>

										
				</div>

							<div id="inread_video_body">
				<div id="inread_video_advert"></div>
				<script>
					function runInlineVideo() {
						jQuery('#inread_video_advert').getInreadVideo({
							'article_total_words' : 500,
							'bbvms_id': 'eg_net_inread_desktop'
						});
					}

					function appendInlineVideo() {
						var inreadScript = document.createElement("script");
						inreadScript.type = "text/javascript";
						inreadScript.async = true;
						inreadScript.src = "/scripts/inread.bbvms.js?v1.2";
						inreadScript.onload = runInlineVideo;
						document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(inreadScript);
					}
				</script>
			</div>
					</article>

								<div class="cover-wrapper">
					<a href="/articles/2019-11-27-games-of-the-decade-destiny-was-at-its-best-when-we-cheesed-it" class="cover" style="background-image: url(&quot;img/placeholder.jpg&quot;);" data-lazyload="url(&quot;https://d2skuhm0vrry40.cloudfront.net/2019/articles/2019-11-26-17-03/games-of-the-decade-destiny-was-at-its-best-when-we-cheesed-it-1574787791064.jpg/EG11/thumbnail/388x218/format/jpg/quality/60/cover.jpg&quot;)"></a>

								<div class="details">
					<p class="title">
						<a href="/articles/2019-11-27-games-of-the-decade-destiny-was-at-its-best-when-we-cheesed-it">
							<span class="prefix">Feature</span>Games of the Decade: Destiny was at its best when we cheesed it						</a>
					</p>
											<p class="subtitle">The Last Word.</p>
										<div class="metadata">
													<a href="/articles/2019-11-27-games-of-the-decade-destiny-was-at-its-best-when-we-cheesed-it#comments" class="comment-count">85</a>
										</div>
				</div>
			</div>
									</div>
											</div>

									</div>

					$(document).ready( function () {
						new LanguageBar({
							site: 1,
							sites: {
																	1: {

										exists: "Do you know about Eurogamer.net?",
										cta: "Click here to visit Eurogamer.net!"
									},
																	2: {
										www: "https://www.eurogamer.de/",

				<script>
					function runFacebookLogin() {
						$("#facebook-login-wrapper").show();
						new FacebookLogin({
							target: $("#fb-login-via-overlay"),
							style: "wide",
							translations: {
								login: "Connect with Facebook",
								working: "Logging in...",
								error: "Sorry, but an error occurred. Please try again."
							}
						});
					}

				<script>
					$(document).ready( function() {
						$("[data-action=launch-sign-in-overlay]").on("click", function(e) {
							$(".sign-in-overlay").addClass("open");
						});

						$(".sign-in-overlay").on("click", function(e) {
							if($(e.target).hasClass("sign-in-container")) {
								$(".sign-in-overlay").removeClass("open");
							}
						});
					});
				</script>
					
		
			<script type="text/javascript">
			function do_the_ads(custom_variables) {

				jQuery(document).ready(function() {

					function getAudienceProjectTargetingData() {
						"use strict";

						var CACHE_KEY = "apr_tdc";
						try {
							var json = window.localStorage.getItem(CACHE_KEY);
							if (json) {
								var cache = JSON.parse(json);
								if (cache.exp > Date.now()) {
									return cache.d;
								}
								else {
									window.localStorage.removeItem(CACHE_KEY);
								}
							}
						}
						catch (err) {
							window.localStorage.removeItem(CACHE_KEY);
						}
						return {};
					};

					function setAPTargeting() {
						var setTargeting = function () {
							var targetingData = getAudienceProjectTargetingData();
							for (var key in targetingData) {
								if (targetingData.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
									window.googletag.pubads().setTargeting(key, targetingData[key]);
								}
							}
						};

						window.googletag = window.googletag || {};
						window.googletag.cmd = window.googletag.cmd || [];
						if (window.googletag.cmd.unshift) {
							window.googletag.cmd.unshift(setTargeting);
						}
						else {
							window.googletag.cmd.push(setTargeting);
						}
					};

					if(jQuery('#content header').length) {
						jQuery('#skyscraper').css({'margin-top' : jQuery('#content header').height() + 'px'});
					}

											if(jQuery('#prod-buy').length > 0) {
							jQuery('#sidebar .games').after('<li id=\"sidebar_amazon\"></li>');
							jQuery('#sidebar_amazon').append(jQuery('#prod-buy'));
							jQuery('#prod-buy').show();
						}
					
					custom_variables['source'] = "article";
					custom_variables['version'] = "hd";
					custom_variables['release'] = "eg12";
					custom_variables['logged_in'] = "false";

											custom_variables['tags'] = ["guide","mobile","iphone","ipad","android","mmo","adventure","anime","fantasy"];
					
											custom_variables['games'] = ["pokmon-go"];
					
					
					
											var ads_space = 450;
					
					if(Cookies.get('sp')) {
						custom_variables['sp_message'] = Cookies.get('sp');
					}

					setAPTargeting();

					jQuery('.advertContainer').getDFPads({
						'custom_variables' : custom_variables,
						'lazyload_spacer': ads_space,
						'showNonPersonalisedAds': false,
												'runUAM': true,
												'size_mappings': {
							'portable-leaderboard': [
								{viewport: [1260, 300], ad_sizes: [[728, 90], [970, 250], [1260, 110], [1260, 250]]},
								{viewport: [ 980, 300], ad_sizes: [[728, 90], [970, 250]]},
								{viewport: [ 750, 300], ad_sizes: [728, 90]},
								{viewport: [ 0, 0], ad_sizes: []}
							],
							'portable-fishbowl': [
								{viewport: [ 980, 300], ad_sizes: [[320, 400], [728, 90], [970, 250]]},
								{viewport: [ 750, 300], ad_sizes: [[320, 400], [728, 90]]},
								{viewport: [ 0, 0], ad_sizes: []}
							],
							'portable-mpu-leader': [
								{viewport: [ 980, 300], ad_sizes: [[300, 250], [728, 90], [970, 250]]},
								{viewport: [ 750, 300], ad_sizes: [[300, 250], [728, 90]]},
								{viewport: [ 0, 0], ad_sizes: []}
							]
						},
						adRenderedCallback: function(slotName, event) {
							if(jQuery(slotName).attr('id').indexOf('STICKY_LB') !== -1) {
								if(!event.isEmpty) {
									jQuery('#sticky_leader_close').show();
									jQuery('#sticky_leaderboard').css({'padding-top':'4px'});
									jQuery('body #browserMaster').css({'padding-bottom':'90px'});
								}
							}
						}
					});

											(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).requestNonPersonalizedAds=0;
						window.adsbygoogle.push({});
					
				});
			}
			</script>

							<script type="text/javascript">
					function appendSourcepoint() {
						( function () {
							var _sp_=function(n){function t(e){if(o[e])return o[e].exports;var r=o[e]={i:e,l:!1,exports:{}};return n[e].call(r.exports,r,r.exports,t),r.l=!0,r.exports}var o={};return t.m=n,t.c=o,t.i=function(n){return n},t.d=function(n,o,e){t.o(n,o)||Object.defineProperty(n,o,{configurable:!1,enumerable:!0,get:e})},t.n=function(n){var o=n&&n.__esModule?function(){return n["default"]}:function(){return n};return t.d(o,"a",o),o},t.o=function(n,t){return Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(n,t)},t.p="",t(t.s=2)}([function(n,t){function o(n,t){e&&console[n].apply(console,["[bootstrap]"].concat(Array.prototype.slice.call(t)))}var strict";function e(){R||(R=!0,D=b.config=b.config||{},s(),F=D.bootstrap&&D.bootstrap.contentControlCallback||D.content_control_callback,q=D.accountId||D.account_id||D.client_id||window.sp_cid,N=D.beacon&&D.beacon.contentControlEndpoint||D.content_control_beacon_endpoint||v.a,D.debug_level&&"OFF"!==D.debug_level.toString().toUpperCase()||D.debug&&D.debug.level&&"OFF"!==D.debug.level.toString().toUpperCase()?j=!0:window.location.search&&null!=window.location.search.match(/_sp_debug_level=(?!off|OFF)/)&&(j=!0),j&&m.useDefaults({defaultLevel:m.DEBUG}))}function Image;r.src="//"+N+"/cct?v="+encodeURIComponent(v.b)+"&ct="+h+"&cid="+encodeURIComponent(q)+"&l="+encodeURIComponent(n.toString())+"&rc="+encodeURIComponent(t)+"&d0="+encodeURIComponent(i)+(o?"&d1="+encodeURIComponent(o):"")+(null==e?"":"&d2="+encodeURIComponent(e)),g.info("sending d=e.lastIndexOf("."),u=e.lastIndexOf("/"),s=-1===d||u>d?e+".png":e.substring(0,d)+".png",l=new Image;l.addEventListener("load",function(){r("1",s)}),l.addEventListener("error",function(){o.i(f.a)(s,function(n,t,o){r("0",s+"::"+o)})}),l.src=s}else r()}function i(n,t,o,e){var r=arguments.length>4&&void 0!==arguments[4]?arguments[4]:{},a=arguments.length>5&&void 0!==arguments[5]&&arguments[5],c=function(){i(n,t,o,e,r,!0)};n(t,a?o:c,e,r)}function a(n,t,o,e){function r(o,r){t(o,n,r,e.enableImageLoad)}function i(t,r){o(t,n,r,e.enableImageLoad),e.onError&&e.onError(r)}var a=document.createElement("script");a.src=n,a.onload=function(){e.onLoad&&e.onLoad()},a.onerror=function(){function t(n){return o.indexOf(n)>-1}var o=(navigator.userAgent||navigator.vendor||window.opera).toLowerCase();t("mobi")||t("ipad")||t("android")||t("iphone")?i(L):t("exabot")?i(O):t("bingbot")||t("bingpreview")?i(k):t("googlebot")||t("adsbot-google")||t("mediapartners-google")?i(C):t("googleweblight")?i(E):window.location.host===w?i(x):t("msie 10")||t("msie 9")||t("msie 8")?i(I):c(n,r,i)},document.head.appendChild(a)}function c(n,t,e){o.i(f.a)(n,function(o,r,i,a){(o||r?t:e)(a,n+"::"+i)})}function d(n,t,o,e){if(S)return void u(U+"::"+n,o);r(y,n,t,o,e,function(){if(F){if(j){g.error("bootstrap locking",y,n,t,o,e);debugger}setTimeout(function(){F()},250)}})}function u(n,t,o,e){r(_,n,t,o,e)}function s(){b._networkListenerData||(b._networkListenerData=o.i(p.a)())}function l(n,t){e(),g.info("bootstrap called with",n,t),i(a,n,d,u,t)}Object.defineProperty(t,"__esModule",{value:!0});var f=o(4),p=o(5),v=o(3),g=o(0),m=void 0;m=o(0);var 			<script>
				// Drop Third-Party Cookies on Consent
				function dropCookies() {
										!function (f, b, e, v, n, t, s) {
						if (f.fbq)return;
						n = f.fbq = function () {
							n.callMethod ?
									n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)
						};
						if (!f._fbq)f._fbq = n;
						n.push = n;
						n.loaded = !0;
						n.version = '2.0';
						n.queue = [];
						t = b.createElement(e);
						t.async = !0;
						t.src = v;
						s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
						s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
					}(window,
							document, 'script', '//connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
					
															fbq('init', '897415313645265');
					
										fbq('init', '738979179819818');
					
											fbq('track', 'PageView');
					
					 appendCarbon(); 				}
			</script>
			<script>
				function doAdsOnConsent() {
					if (typeof do_the_ads == 'function') {
						do_the_ads({});
					}

					if (typeof do_the_ads_mobile == 'function') {
						do_the_ads_mobile();
					}

					if (typeof do_the_ads_portable == 'function') {
						do_the_ads_portable();
					}
				}
			</script>

				})();
			}

				var ap_script = document.createElement("script");

				ap_script.async = true;

					<script>
				function mormontLoaded () {
					if (typeof OptanonActiveGroups !== 'undefined' && OptanonActiveGroups.match(/,2,/) && !window.mormontDone) {
						runMormont();
					}
				}

				function runMormont() {
					if (!mormont) return;
										mormont('configure', 'property', 'eurogamer');
											mormont('set', 'section', 'article');
										if (window.location.pathname.match('^/profile')) {
						mormont('set', 'section', 'community');
					}
					if (window.location.pathname.match('^/inbox')) {
						mormont('set', 'section', 'user');
					}
											mormont('set', 'language', 'en');
																mormont('set', 'platforms', ["mobile","iphone","ipad","android"]);
																mormont('set', 'tags', ["genre:mmo","genre:mmo","genre:mmo","game:pokmon-go"]);
																					mormont('set', 'published', '2018-12-21T15:01:00+00:00');
						mormont('set', 'article_type', 'guide');
																mormont('set', 'author', "Chris Tapsell");
											mormont('send', 'pageview');
											mormont('trackClicks', ['article']);
										window.mormontDone = true;
				};
			</script>
			<script src="https://cdn.gamer-network.net/2018/scripts/mormont/v2.20.0/mormont.js" async="" onload="mormontLoaded()"></script>

					<script>
				jQuery(document).ready(function(){
					renderEdmonds('.edmonds-block', {
						'site': 'eurogamer.net',
					});

					// Check for other Amazon links and add subtag if required
					jQuery.each(jQuery('article main a'), function(i, k) {

						var link_href = jQuery(k).attr('href');
					    if(link_href.match(/amazon\./i) && link_href.indexOf('ascsubtag') == -1) {

					      subtag='';
					      if(window.location.pathname.length > 1){
					        var subtag = window.location.pathname.substring(1);
					        subtag = subtag.replace(/\//g,'-').substring(0,89);
					      } else {
					        subtag='index';
					      }
					      link_href = link_href + ((link_href.indexOf('?') == -1) ? '?ascsubtag=' : '&ascsubtag=') + subtag;

					      jQuery(k).attr('href', link_href);

					    }

					});

				});
			</script>
						<script>
				function appendVideoPlayer() {
											// Video Player
						var videos = $(".video-player");
						for(i = 0; i < videos.length; i++) {
							var video = $(videos[i]);
							new videoPlayer({
								player: video,
								label: video.attr('data-label'),
								more: "More videos",
								subscribe: "Subscribe to our YouTube channel",
								version: "hd",
								error: "Sorry, but there was an error loading the video player.",
							});
						}
									}

								<script>
							function checkBBVMS() {
								function youtube_parser(url){
									var regExp = /^.*((youtu.be\/)|(v\/)|(\/u\/\w\/)|(embed\/)|(watch\?))\??v?=?([^#\&\?]*).*/;
									var match = url.match(regExp);
									return (match&&match[7].length==11)? match[7] : false;
								}

								jQuery('article iframe').each(function(){
									src = jQuery(this).attr('src');
									if(src) {
										check_yt = youtube_parser(src);
										if(check_yt){
											jQuery(this).attr('id', 'yt-' + check_yt);
											jQuery.getJSON( "https://gamernetwork.bbvms.com/json/search?query=%22" + check_yt + "%22", function( data ) {
												if(data['items'][0]) {
													replace_yt = check_yt;
													if(data['items'][0]['youtubeImportId_string']) {
														replace_yt = data['items'][0]['youtubeImportId_string'];
													}
													if(data['items'][0]['YouTube_id_string']) {
														replace_yt = data['items'][0]['YouTube_id_string'];
													}
													yt_video_wrapper = jQuery('#yt-' + replace_yt).parent().parent().parent();
													jQuery('> div', yt_video_wrapper).append('<div class="bb_wrapper"><script type="text/javascript" src="//gamernetwork.bbvms.com/p/eurogamer/c/' + data['items'][0]['id'] + '.js" async="true"><\/script></div>');
													jQuery('.video-container', yt_video_wrapper).remove();
													jQuery('.like-and-subscribe', yt_video_wrapper).html('<a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=' + replace_yt + '" class="button wide" target="_blank" onclick="ga(\'send\',\'event\',\'Video\',\'Click YT Link\',\'' + replace_yt + '\')">Watch on YouTube</a>');
												};
											});
										}
									}
								});
							}
						</script>
					
								<script src="https://cdn.cookielaw.org/consent/b09f044e-6444-4266-8ca8-4258e6c31748.js" type="text/javascript" charset="UTF-8"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				function loadIframes(){
					var iframes = $("iframe[data-src]");
					$.each(iframes,function() {
						var iframe = $(this);
						iframe.attr("src", iframe.attr("data-src"));
					});
				}

				function showOneTrustPlaceholders() {
					if (window.OneTrustPlaceholdersDone) return;
					var elements = document.querySelectorAll('.onetrust-placeholder');
					for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i ++) {
						var element = elements[i];
						element.style.display = '';
					}
					window.OneTrustPlaceholdersDone = true;
				}

				function removeOneTrustPlaceholders(type) {
					var identifier = '.onetrust-placeholder';
					identifier += type ? '[data-type="' + type + '"]' : '';
					var elements = document.querySelectorAll(identifier);
					for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i ++) {
						var element = elements[i];
						element.remove();
					}
				}

				function OptanonWrapper() {
					// Run performance
					if(OptanonActiveGroups.match(/,2,/)){
						if (typeof appendComscore == 'function') {
							appendComscore();
						}
						if (typeof runMormont == 'function' && typeof mormont !== 'undefined' && !window.mormontDone) {
							runMormont();
						}
						if (typeof gaWrapper == 'function') {
							gaWrapper();
						}
					} else {
						if (typeof gaAnonWrapper == 'function') {
							gaAnonWrapper();
						}
					}

					// Run functional
					if(OptanonActiveGroups.match(/,3,/)){
						if (typeof appendSourcepoint == 'function') {
							appendSourcepoint();
						}
						removeOneTrustPlaceholders('functional');
					}

					// Run targeting
					if(OptanonActiveGroups.match(/,4,/)){
						if (typeof doAdsOnConsent == 'function') {
							doAdsOnConsent();
						}
						if (typeof loadIframes == 'function') {
							loadIframes();
						}
						if (typeof checkBBVMS == 'function') {
							checkBBVMS();
						}
						if (typeof appendFacebookSDK == 'function') {
							appendFacebookSDK();
						}
						if (typeof appendVideoPlayer == 'function') {
							appendVideoPlayer();
						}
						if (typeof appendTwitchPlayer == 'function') {
							appendTwitchPlayer();
						}
						if (typeof appendVideoExplorer == 'function') {
							appendVideoExplorer();
						}
						if (typeof appendGoogleCustomSearch == 'function') {
							appendGoogleCustomSearch();
						}
						if (typeof appendYouTubeAPI == 'function') {
							appendYouTubeAPI(); // Used for DFGraph
						}
						if (typeof appendAudienceProject == 'function') {
							appendAudienceProject();
						}
						if (typeof dropCookies == 'function') {
							dropCookies();
						}
						if (typeof appendInlineVideo == 'function') {
							appendInlineVideo();
						}
						if (typeof appendCaptify == 'function') {
							appendCaptify();
						}
						if (typeof appendSkimlinks == 'function') {
							appendSkimlinks();
						}
						if (typeof appendGemius == 'function') {
							appendGemius();
						}
						if (typeof appendBBElements == 'function') {
							appendBBElements();
						}
						removeOneTrustPlaceholders('targeting');
					}

					showOneTrustPlaceholders();
				}
			</script>
			

		</div></body></html>
